My profile My kul number: My education: Not signed in My campus: No campus selected Traffic Edit No absences found Go to profile Please log in first Bus & train Let\'s dine My absences Restaurants No buses found No campus found No groups found No meals found No restaurants found My traffic info My home station My courses No courses found Reset courses data Bistro t\'forum Week menu Dashboard Timetable Profile Menu Credits Settings Opening hours "Bistro \'t Forum is the restaurant with table service at VIVES campus Kortrijk. You can go there every day from 10:00 to 16:00 for a selection of hot and cold dishes, a drink or just a coffee in a quiet atmosphere. The kitchen is open from 11:30 to 13:45. On warm days there is an outdoor terrace on the water with a view of the campus. Do you have lessons at a specific time or are you in a hurry? Place your order BEFORE 11.30 am and we will provide super-fast service. Give permission Delete account Delete all account data When deleting your account, your personal data and preferences will be removed from the VIVESplus app, you will be logged out. \nThis does not mean that your account at the university, which you use to log in to numerous systems, will also be deleted.
